title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: The trial is underway and the Atwals are under fire from Ghosh and the prosecution. Papaji’s freedom is at stake, and just when everything seems hopeless, Rinku pulls a rabbit out of the hat and all hell breaks loose.
